DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the geriatric patients with the non-geriatrics undergoing outpatient unilateral herniorrhapy in terms of local anesthesia, sedation, recovery and early morbidity.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Analysis of the Geriatric Patients Underwent Unilateral Inguinal Herniorrhaphy
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective data analysis will be conducted and the patient records will be evaluated for patient characteristics local anesthesia, sedation, recovery and early morbidity.
DOC.criteria: patients with a unilateral inguinal hernia undergoing herniorrhaphy
